about.headline: About Us
about.content: Alex and Zoe Sanders have a combined 76 years of experience in practicing law. They are father and daughter. They formed the firm to help people and businesses who find themselves involved in the justice system. Alex Sanders is a trial and appellate lawyer, and former state senator and college president. Zoe Sanders is a criminal, civil and regulatory lawyer with broad and in depth experience helping individuals and entities through complex issues. She has represented such diverse individuals as the comedian Stephen Colbert, U.S. Attorney General John Ashcroft and a battered spouse charged with the murder of her husband.
